metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29983 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Firefox for Android could get stuck in fullscreen mode and not exit it evenafter normal interactions that should cause it to exit. *Note: This issueonly affected Firefox for Android. Other operating systems areunaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 91.

criterions.comment: mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
